title: Toothpaste made with keratin may protect and repair damaged teeth: study
summary:
A new study published on August 13, 2025, reveals that keratin, a protein found in hair, skin, and wool, can be used in toothpaste to repair damaged tooth enamel and prevent early decay. Scientists at King's College London found that keratin forms a protective coating on teeth, mimicking the structure and function of natural enamel by attracting minerals in saliva. This keratin-based treatment can stop enamel erosion caused by acidic foods, poor hygiene, and aging, addressing tooth sensitivity and preventing tooth loss.

Unlike fluoride toothpastes that only slow decay, keratin creates a dense mineral layer that protects teeth and seals off sensitive nerve channels. This treatment can be delivered through daily toothpaste or a professionally applied gel. The team hopes to make keratin-based enamel regeneration available to the public within 2-3 years.

The study, published in Advanced Healthcare Materials, showed that keratin extracted from wool forms a crystal-like scaffold that attracts calcium and phosphate ions, leading to the growth of a protective enamel-like coating. This sustainable and eco-friendly approach uses biological waste materials and eliminates the need for toxic plastic resins found in traditional dental treatments. The research highlights keratin as a promising candidate for future dental care, aligning with efforts to transform waste into valuable clinical resources.
chinese_title: 用角蛋白制成的牙膏或能保护和修复受损牙齿：研究
chinese_summary:
一项于2025年8月13日发表的新研究表明，头发、皮肤和羊毛中发现的角蛋白可用于牙膏，修复受损的牙釉质并预防早期蛀牙。伦敦国王学院的科学家发现，角蛋白会在牙齿上形成保护性涂层，通过吸引唾液中的矿物质来模仿天然牙釉质的结构和功能。这种基于角蛋白的治疗方法可以阻止酸性食物、不良卫生习惯和衰老引起的牙釉质腐蚀，从而解决牙齿敏感问题并防止牙齿脱落。

与仅能减缓蛀牙的含氟牙膏不同，角蛋白会形成致密的矿物质层，保护牙齿并封闭敏感的神经通道。这种治疗方法可以通过日常牙膏或专业涂抹的凝胶来实现。该团队希望在2-3年内向公众提供基于角蛋白的牙釉质再生技术。

该研究发表在《先进医疗保健材料》杂志上，表明从羊毛中提取的角蛋白形成了一种类似晶体的支架，可以吸引钙和磷酸根离子，从而促进保护性类釉质涂层的生长。这种可持续且环保的方法利用生物废弃物，无需传统牙科治疗中使用的有毒塑料树脂。该研究强调角蛋白是未来牙科护理的一个有希望的候选者，符合将废物转化为有价值的临床资源的努力。

title: New Cloudflare Pirate Site Blocking May Involve Domains
summary:
This article discusses Cloudflare's recent entry into the UK's pirate site blocking landscape, joining ISPs like BT and Virgin Media. Cloudflare's blocking is indicated by Error 451, citing legal reasons, and linking to older injunctions obtained by Hollywood studios.

The potential scale of Cloudflare's blocking is significant, possibly encompassing over 1,000 domains, though the exact number is unclear due to a lack of transparency. While Cloudflare has submitted some information to the Lumen Database, details remain limited, requiring assumptions.

The injunctions, originally obtained between 2021 and 2024, are dynamic, allowing for the addition of new domains. While initial orders listed around 50 domains each, the real number of blocked sites is far greater, especially considering domains added after the initial orders. Examples include hundreds of domains containing terms like '123movie', 'Putlocker', 'bflix' and 'fmovies'.

A recent batch of new domain blockings by UK ISPs, including Cloudflare, targeted brands like gomovies and 123movies, but errors were noted in the linked takedown notices.

The article emphasizes the lack of transparency surrounding domain blocking and the difficulties for average users to determine if access failures are due to erroneous blocking. Despite the increasing risks associated with mass site blocking, significant resources are spent on these systems. Ironically, bypassing Cloudflare's block is as simple as changing a browser setting, raising questions about the effectiveness and value of the blocking measures.

title: Modern Cars Wreak Havoc on Radar Detectors
summary:
This article discusses the challenges modern cars' collision avoidance systems (CAS) pose to radar detectors, specifically focusing on Escort Radar's Redline 360c and its recent firmware update. Modern cars' CAS, like blind-spot monitoring and adaptive cruise control, emit radar signals that trigger false alerts in detectors.

Escort's new firmware (version 1.17) aims to improve filtering to distinguish between these "CAS blasts" and legitimate police radar. The update also claims improvements in POP alert detection, directional indicator responsiveness, K-band filtering customization, and Wi-Fi connectivity for OnStar users.

The author tested the updated Redline 360c and found it accurately detected speed traps, with the directional warnings working effectively. While the "Drive Smarter" app had some connectivity issues, the detector itself performed well.

The article also touches on the morality of using radar detectors, arguing that there's a difference between exceeding speed limits safely and reckless driving. While excessive speeding is dangerous, having information on potential speed traps isn't inherently wrong. Escort actively solicits user feedback through forums and beta testing to improve its products and released a white paper detailing its testing methodology.
chinese_title: 现代汽车对雷达探测器的干扰
chinese_summary:
本文探讨了现代汽车碰撞避免系统 (CAS) 对雷达探测器构成的挑战，特别关注了 Escort Radar 的 Redline 360c 及其最新的固件更新。现代汽车的 CAS，如盲点监测和自适应巡航控制，会发射雷达信号，从而触发探测器的误报。

Escort 的新固件（版本 1.17）旨在改进过滤功能，以区分这些“CAS 干扰”和合法的警用雷达。该更新还声称改进了 POP 警报检测、方向指示器响应、K 波段过滤定制以及面向 OnStar 用户的 Wi-Fi 连接。

作者测试了更新后的 Redline 360c，发现它准确地检测到了测速陷阱，并且方向警告效果很好。 虽然“Drive Smarter”应用程序存在一些连接问题，但探测器本身的性能良好。

本文还探讨了使用雷达探测器的道德问题，认为安全超速和鲁莽驾驶之间存在差异。 虽然过度超速是危险的，但掌握有关潜在测速陷阱的信息本身并没有错。 Escort 通过论坛和 Beta 测试积极征求用户反馈，以改进其产品，并发布了一份白皮书，详细说明了其测试方法。

title: Reverse Engineering Claude Code CLI Using Sub Agents
summary:
In this article from July 2025, Sabrina Ramonov describes how she reverse-engineered Claude Code CLI using custom Claude sub-agents for educational purposes. These sub-agents, a new feature, are specialized AI assistants designed to handle specific tasks with tailored system prompts, tools, and context windows.

To reverse engineer the code, she employed three sub-agents: a File Splitter to chunk the minified JavaScript code, a Structure Analyzer to identify code patterns and dependencies, and a Beautifier to format the code.

The sub-agents uncovered several interesting findings:

1.  **Claude Code's TODO Tool Prompt:** A detailed prompt engineered to guide the AI on when and how to use a to-do list to track progress on complex tasks, emphasizing proactive task management.
2.  **Experimental ULTRACLAUDE.md:** The existence of an experimental mode called UltraClaude.
3.  **Claude Code's Web Fetch Tool Prompt:** Details on how Claude Code retrieves and analyzes web content, including guidelines on URL handling, prompt usage, and response constraints.
4.  **PLAN MODE System Reminders:** Revealing internal reminders related to a "PLAN MODE."

Ramonov found sub-agents effective for long-running, straightforward tasks that can be parallelized, emphasizing the importance of explicit instructions for optimal results, especially for complex tasks. She also recommends sandboxing sub-agents for security.
chinese_title: 使用子代理逆向工程 Claude 代码 CLI
chinese_summary:
在 2025 年 7 月的文章中，Sabrina Ramonov 描述了她如何出于教育目的，使用自定义 Claude 子代理对 Claude Code CLI 进行逆向工程。这些子代理是一项新功能，是专门设计用于处理特定任务的 AI 助手，具有定制的系统提示、工具和上下文窗口。

为了逆向工程代码，她使用了三个子代理：一个文件分割器，用于分割压缩后的 JavaScript 代码；一个结构分析器，用于识别代码模式和依赖关系；以及一个美化器，用于格式化代码。

这些子代理揭示了几个有趣的发现：

1.  **Claude Code 的 TODO 工具提示：** 一个详细的提示，旨在指导 AI 何时以及如何使用待办事项列表来跟踪复杂任务的进度，强调主动的任务管理。
2.  **实验性的 ULTRACLAUDE.md：** 存在一个名为 UltraClaude 的实验模式。
3.  **Claude Code 的 Web Fetch 工具提示：** 关于 Claude Code 如何检索和分析网络内容的详细信息，包括 URL 处理、提示使用和响应约束的指南。
4.  **PLAN MODE 系统提醒：** 揭示了与 “PLAN MODE” 相关的内部提醒。

Ramonov 发现子代理对于可以并行化的、长时间运行的简单任务非常有效，强调了明确指令对于获得最佳结果的重要性，尤其是在处理复杂任务时。她还建议对子代理进行沙盒化以提高安全性。

title: Good system design
summary:
This article outlines key principles of good system design, contrasting it with overly complex or LinkedIn/Twitter-optimized advice. The author defines system design as assembling services, where the goal is often to achieve a state of "nothing going wrong" rather than impressive complexity. Simplicity and avoiding premature optimization are emphasized.

A core principle is minimizing stateful components, as they are prone to errors and require manual intervention. Instead, favor stateless services that can be easily restarted. The database, the central repository of state, is thus critical. Flexible schema design is important, but avoid overly generic schemas that shift complexity to application code. Indexing strategies should match common queries.

Bottlenecks are often database-related, so efficient database querying techniques like JOINs are crucial. Prioritize sending read queries to replicas and be wary of query spikes. Split slow operations by performing the minimum necessary work for the user immediately and then offloading the rest to background jobs.

Caching is valuable but should be used judiciously to avoid state-related problems. Explore alternatives like using scheduled jobs and document storage for persistent, large-scale caches. Event hubs (like Kafka) facilitate communication between services, but direct API calls are often preferable for their simplicity and easier debugging.

Finally, the article discusses push versus pull mechanisms for data distribution. While pull is common for websites, push can be more efficient for internal services or large-scale client applications like Gmail.
chinese_title: 好的系统设计
chinese_summary:
本文概述了优秀系统设计的关键原则，并将其与过于复杂或以领英/推特为优化目标的建议进行了对比。作者将系统设计定义为组装服务，其目标通常是实现“不出错”的状态，而不是令人印象深刻的复杂性。文中强调了简单性，并避免过早优化。

一个核心原则是最小化有状态组件，因为它们容易出错并需要人工干预。相反，应该倾向于易于重启的无状态服务。数据库是状态的中心存储库，因此至关重要。灵活的模式设计很重要，但应避免过于通用的模式，以免将复杂性转移到应用程序代码中。索引策略应与常用查询相匹配。

瓶颈通常与数据库相关，因此像JOIN这样的高效数据库查询技术至关重要。优先将读取查询发送到副本，并警惕查询峰值。拆分缓慢的操作，立即为用户执行所需的最少工作，然后将其余工作卸载到后台任务。

缓存很有价值，但应谨慎使用，以避免与状态相关的问题。探索替代方案，例如使用计划作业和文档存储来实现持久的、大规模的缓存。事件中心（如Kafka）有助于服务之间的通信，但直接API调用通常更可取，因为它们更简单且更易于调试。

最后，本文讨论了数据分发的推送与拉取机制。虽然拉取对于网站来说很常见，但推送对于内部服务或像Gmail这样的大型客户端应用程序来说可能更有效。

title: Do things that don't scale, and then don't scale
summary:
Adam Derewecki argues that the drive to scale every software project, popularized by the "do things that don't scale" mantra, is no longer always necessary or desirable in the age of AI-assisted coding. With tools like GPT, building software is so much easier and cheaper that individuals can create niche, personalized solutions without the pressure of turning them into full-fledged businesses.

He illustrates this with three examples: a small, intimate Slack workspace that benefits from its limited size; a rebuilt postcard mailing service specifically tailored for his mom, avoiding the complexities of a public platform; and a simple landline pill reminder app for his mom, bypassing the liabilities of a scalable medical reminder service.

The core idea is that the low cost and ease of development provided by AI allow developers to create software for a very small, even singular, audience, and that can be the optimal outcome. Derewecki suggests embracing this freedom, resisting the urge to scale, and finding satisfaction in creating something "small, useful, and perfectly yours." The article suggests a pattern: identify a personally relevant need, build a simple solution, resist scaling, and enjoy the result. Ultimately, he believes the greatest luxury of today's development tools isn't just speed or cost, but the liberty to stop and be content with a small, perfectly tailored solution.
chinese_title: 做那些无法规模化的事，然后就别规模化。
chinese_summary:
亚当·德雷韦茨基认为，在人工智能辅助编码的时代，由“做那些不可规模化的事情”这一口号所推广的，推动每个软件项目都规模化的做法，不再总是必要或可取的。借助 GPT 等工具，构建软件变得如此简单和廉价，以至于个人可以创建小众的、个性化的解决方案，而无需承受将其转化为成熟业务的压力。

他用三个例子来说明这一点：一个因其规模有限而受益的小型、私密的 Slack 工作区；一个专门为他母亲量身定制的、重建的明信片邮寄服务，避免了公共平台的复杂性；以及一个为他母亲设计的简单座机服药提醒应用程序，绕过了可扩展的医疗提醒服务的责任。

核心思想是，人工智能提供的低成本和易于开发的特性，使得开发者可以为非常小的，甚至单个的受众创建软件，而这可能就是最佳结果。德雷韦茨基建议拥抱这种自由，抵制规模化的冲动，并在创造“小巧、有用且完全属于你”的东西中找到满足感。 这篇文章提出了一个模式：识别一个与个人相关的需求，构建一个简单的解决方案，抵制规模化，并享受结果。 最终，他认为当今开发工具的最大优势不仅仅是速度或成本，而是可以停下来，并对一个小巧、完美定制的解决方案感到满足的自由。

title: For Iris Murdoch, morality is about love, not duties and rules
summary:
Iris Murdoch challenges the traditional view of morality as being solely based on duties and rules, arguing that **love** is central to morality. She believes that our vision of the world, particularly our perception of others, shapes our actions and that distorting this vision is a moral failing.

Murdoch emphasizes the importance of **attention**, drawing from Simone Weil. She suggests that our most basic moral activities involve attending to things in specific ways, shaping our overall vision.

The ego, according to Murdoch, is the primary obstacle to true vision. Driven by anxiety and self-centeredness, it leads to **fantasies** that distort reality and prevent us from seeing others as they truly are. She illustrates this with the example of "M" and "D", where M's prejudice colors her perception of D.

To overcome the ego and its fantasies, Murdoch proposes **loving attention**. This involves a generous, patient, and just way of attending to others, recognizing their intrinsic value. Loving attention draws us out of ourselves, allowing us to grasp the reality of others and improving the moral quality of our vision. It is a powerful force that counteracts our inclination towards self-centeredness and enabling us to see the truth.

While acknowledging that human love can be flawed and misleading, Murdoch considers attentive love as the ideal, representing a genuine and morally significant engagement with reality.
chinese_title: 对于艾丽斯·默多克来说，道德是关于爱，而非义务和规则。
chinese_summary:
艾瑞斯·默多克挑战了将道德完全建立在义务和规则之上的传统观点，认为**爱**是道德的核心。她相信我们对世界的看法，特别是我们对他人的感知，塑造了我们的行为，而扭曲这种看法是一种道德上的失败。

默多克强调**关注**的重要性，借鉴了西蒙娜·薇依的思想。她认为，我们最基本的道德活动涉及以特定的方式关注事物，从而塑造我们的整体视野。

在默多克看来，自我(Ego)是实现真正视野的主要障碍。在焦虑和以自我为中心的驱动下，它会导致**幻想**，扭曲现实，并阻止我们看到他人真实的模样。她用“M”和“D”的例子来说明这一点，M的偏见影响了她对D的看法。

为了克服自我及其幻想，默多克提出了**充满爱的关注**。这涉及以慷慨、耐心和公正的方式关注他人，认识到他们内在的价值。充满爱的关注将我们从自身中抽离出来，使我们能够把握他人的现实，并提高我们视野的道德品质。这是一种强大的力量，可以抵消我们以自我为中心的倾向，并使我们能够看到真相。

虽然承认人类的爱可能存在缺陷和误导性，但默多克将专注的爱视为理想，代表着对现实的真诚且具有重要道德意义的投入。

title: Passive Microwave Repeaters
summary:
This article discusses passive microwave repeaters, a technology developed to overcome line-of-sight limitations in microwave telecommunications, particularly in mountainous or challenging terrains. Microwave radio became a crucial telecommunication advancement due to its high bandwidth capacity, originating from radar technology developed during World War II. However, microwave signals require a direct line of sight between antennas, presenting difficulties in areas with obstructions.

Passive microwave repeaters, essentially large, flat metallic panels functioning as mirrors, redirect microwave signals around obstacles or over long distances. These repeaters don't require power, making them ideal for remote locations where active repeaters (which amplify the signal) are impractical.

The Kreitzberg brothers, James and George, pioneered this technology. James, an engineer at Montana Power, conceived the idea, and George's aviation company, Kreitzberg Aviation, fabricated the first passive repeater. This led to the formation of Microflect, a company specializing in these "billboards" used in mountainous regions.

The article explains that passive repeaters can even provide gain, counterintuitively. While active repeaters add power, passive repeaters function by collecting a large cross-section of the microwave energy and re-emitting it. Their large surface area, exceeding practical antenna sizes, "collects" more energy, leading to gain. Size is a key factor, with larger repeaters reflecting a larger cross-section of energy, leading to increased gain.
chinese_title: 无源微波中继器
chinese_summary:
本文探讨了无源微波中继器。这项技术旨在克服微波通信中的视距限制，特别是在山区或复杂地形中。微波无线电凭借其高带宽容量，成为一项重要的电信技术进步，其起源可追溯至二战期间开发的雷达技术。然而，微波信号需要在天线之间保持直接视线，这给有障碍物的地区带来了困难。

无源微波中继器本质上是大型扁平金属面板，其功能类似于镜子，可将微波信号绕过障碍物或传输到较远的距离。这些中继器不需要电源，因此非常适合有源中继器（放大信号）不切实际的偏远地区。

克莱茨伯格兄弟詹姆斯和乔治是这项技术的先驱。詹姆斯是蒙大拿电力公司的一名工程师，他提出了这个想法，乔治的航空企业克莱茨伯格航空制造了第一个无源中继器。这促成了Microflect公司的成立，该公司专门生产用于山区地区的这种“广告牌”。

本文解释说，无源中继器甚至可以提供增益，这与直觉相反。有源中继器增加功率，而无源中继器通过收集大量的微波能量并重新发射来实现增益。它们的大表面积超过了实际天线尺寸，可以“收集”更多的能量，从而产生增益。尺寸是关键因素，较大的中继器可以反射较大的能量截面，从而增加增益。

title: The trap of tech that's great in the small but not in the large
summary:
Lorin Hochstein's article, "The trap of tech that's great in the small but not in the large," discusses the pitfall of using technologies that are effective for small-scale tasks but become problematic as the project grows. The author argues that migrating away from these technologies is often delayed due to the incremental growth of the project and the initial convenience they offer, eventually leading to significant issues.

Hochstein provides several examples:

*   **Shell Scripts:** Useful for simple tasks (under 20 lines) but unsuitable for complex logic with `if` statements, recommending Python as an alternative.
*   **Makefiles:** Great for simple task running and building small Go programs but a nightmare for large-scale projects, necessitating tools like Maven, Gradle, or Bazel.
*   **YAML:** Suitable for reasonably sized configuration files (under 30 lines) but becomes unwieldy and difficult to manage in large files, diminishing its human-readability.
*   **Spreadsheets:** While a successful end-user programming tool, they can become problematic when used as de facto databases due to the significant leap required to transition to a proper database.
*   **Markdown:** The author defers to Hillel Wayne's argument that Markdown is unsuitable for large writing projects like books, advocating for rST (reStructuredText) instead.

In essence, the article warns against the allure of initially convenient technologies that lack scalability, highlighting the importance of choosing tools that can accommodate future growth and complexity.
chinese_title: 在小处出色，在大处糟糕的技术陷阱
chinese_summary:
Lorin Hochstein的文章《适用于小规模但不适用于大规模的技术陷阱》探讨了使用在小规模任务中有效，但随着项目增长而变得有问题的技术的弊端。作者认为，由于项目的渐进式增长以及这些技术最初提供的便利，迁移到其他技术的时机常常被延误，最终导致重大问题。

Hochstein列举了几个例子：

*   **Shell脚本：** 适用于简单的任务（20行以内），但不适合具有 `if` 语句的复杂逻辑，建议使用Python作为替代方案。
*   **Makefiles：** 非常适合运行简单任务和构建小型Go程序，但对于大型项目来说是噩梦，需要Maven、Gradle或Bazel等工具。
*   **YAML：** 适用于合理大小的配置文件（30行以内），但在大型文件中变得笨拙且难以管理，降低了其人类可读性。
*   **电子表格：** 虽然是一种成功的最终用户编程工具，但当用作事实上的数据库时，会变得有问题，因为过渡到合适的数据库需要巨大的飞跃。
*   **Markdown：** 作者参考了Hillel Wayne的论点，即Markdown不适合像书籍这样的大型写作项目，主张使用rST（reStructuredText）代替。

本质上，这篇文章警告人们不要被最初方便但缺乏可扩展性的技术所迷惑，强调了选择能够适应未来增长和复杂性的工具的重要性。

title: Office on HP-UX and Unix
summary:
This article from OpenPA details the availability of office and productivity software on HP-UX and Unix systems, primarily during the 1980s and 1990s. While HP-UX's primary use was technical and engineering, software ports allowed engineers to integrate into the broader office environment. Several popular office suites were ported to Unix until the mid-1990s, including CorelDRAW! for graphics and WordPerfect, Ami Pro, Applixware, and IslandOffice for general office tasks. Lotus 1-2-3 and Wingz were used for spreadsheets, with professional publishing handled by FrameMaker, Interleaf, and WebWorks.

The article provides specific version information and support details for each application on HP-UX, particularly PA-RISC workstations. CorelDRAW versions 2.0.1, 3.0, and 3.5 were available, with version 3.5 also ported to Linux (Caldera). WordPerfect had a long run, from version 4.2 to 8.0, supporting various HP-UX versions and including features like spell checkers and MS Office 97 converters. Ami Pro 3.0 was briefly available on HP-UX. Applixware, a complete office suite, also saw a Unix/HP-UX release around 2000. IslandOffice offered a suite of applications (Write, Draw, Paint, Calc, Presents, Chart) with varying version support for HP-UX. Lotus 1-2-3 was ported in the early 90s, with HP involved in the licensing/support. Wingz was a graphical spreadsheet application available for HP-UX, particularly versions 1.1a and 3.0. The author notes the difficulty in finding surviving documentation.
chinese_title: HP-UX和Unix上的Office
chinese_summary:
这篇OpenPA的文章详细介绍了20世纪80年代和90年代HP-UX和Unix系统上办公和生产力软件的可用性。尽管HP-UX的主要用途是技术和工程，但软件移植使工程师能够融入更广泛的办公环境。直到20世纪90年代中期，一些流行的办公套件被移植到Unix系统，包括用于图形的CorelDRAW!以及用于一般办公任务的WordPerfect、Ami Pro、Applixware和IslandOffice。Lotus 1-2-3和Wingz用于电子表格，而FrameMaker、Interleaf和WebWorks用于专业出版。

该文章提供了HP-UX上每个应用程序的特定版本信息和支持细节，特别是PA-RISC工作站。CorelDRAW提供了2.0.1、3.0和3.5版本，其中3.5版本也移植到了Linux (Caldera)。WordPerfect的运行时间很长，从4.2版本到8.0版本，支持各种HP-UX版本，并包括拼写检查器和MS Office 97转换器等功能。Ami Pro 3.0曾在HP-UX上短暂可用。Applixware，一个完整的办公套件，也在2000年左右发布了Unix/HP-UX版本。IslandOffice提供了一套应用程序（Write、Draw、Paint、Calc、Presents、Chart），对HP-UX的支持版本各不相同。Lotus 1-2-3在90年代初被移植，惠普参与了许可/支持。Wingz是一个用于HP-UX的图形电子表格应用程序，特别是1.1a和3.0版本。作者注意到很难找到现存的文档。

title: Running Wayland Clients as Non-Root Users on Yocto
summary:
This article addresses the security concern of running Wayland clients, specifically Qt applications, as root users on embedded Linux systems built with Yocto. The author, Burkhard Stubert, highlights that this practice violates the principle of least privilege and raises concerns with regulations like the EU Cyber Resilience Act (EU CRA).

The core problem lies in the permissions of the Wayland socket file, typically `/run/wayland-0`, which requires root privileges for client access. The article explores options to run clients as non-root users, focusing on running them as user "weston," the default user for Weston compositor.

The solution involves several steps implemented via a `weston-init.bbappend` recipe extension:

1.  Modifying `weston.service` and `weston.socket` to change the user and group from root to "weston" and "wayland," respectively.
2.  Passing the socket file name (e.g., `/run/wayland-0`) to Weston using the `-S` option in `weston.service` to ensure consistent socket naming.
3.  Creating an environment file, `/etc/default/weston-client`, containing `XDG_RUNTIME_DIR=/run/user/2000` (assuming static user ID 2000 for "weston") and `WAYLAND_DISPLAY=/run/wayland-0`, and including this file in the service unit of each Wayland client.

Finally, the service unit for each Wayland client application is modified to specify `User=weston` and `EnvironmentFile=/etc/default/weston-client`. This ensures that the applications run with the "weston" user's privileges, using the correctly configured environment variables for Wayland communication, eliminating the need for root privileges. The solution ensures consistent socket naming across the Weston compositor and clients, preventing connection errors.
chinese_title: 在 Yocto 上以非 root 用户身份运行 Wayland 客户端

title: PuTTY has a new website

title: A single lock of hair could rewrite what we know about Inca record-keeping
summary:
Here's a summary of the article "A single lock of hair could rewrite what we know about Inca record-keeping," based on the information I can gather about it from search results and generally available knowledge:

The article discusses how analyzing a lock of hair from a young Inca woman sacrificed hundreds of years ago is providing new insights into Inca record-keeping and societal practices. While the Inca are famous for their lack of a written language, they utilized a system of knotted strings called *quipu* to record information, including census data, taxes, and historical narratives. The mystery surrounding *quipu* is how they conveyed complex information without writing.

Researchers are now using the hair sample to analyze the woman's diet and drug use leading up to her sacrifice. By examining the chemical isotopes present in the hair, which record dietary intake over time, they can reconstruct her movements and social status. Specifically, changes in diet (transitioning from peasant food to elite food like maize and meat) and the presence of substances such as coca suggest she was being prepared for a ritual.

This type of analysis is significant because it can be correlated with the information recorded on *quipu*. By studying multiple individuals whose remains are linked to specific *quipu*, scientists hope to decipher the meanings encoded within the knots and colors of the strings. For instance, dietary changes and the use of coca might correspond to specific events or rituals recorded in the *quipu*. Therefore, this interdisciplinary approach combining archaeological science, historical records, and *quipu* analysis could revolutionize our understanding of Inca civilization and their sophisticated record-keeping system, offering a new perspective beyond traditional Spanish colonial accounts.
chinese_title: 一缕头发或能改写我们对印加记录方式的认知。
chinese_summary:
以下是基于我从搜索结果和一般知识中收集的信息，对文章“一缕头发或将改写我们对印加记录保存方式的认知”的总结：

该文章探讨了对几百年前被献祭的年轻印加女性的一缕头发的分析，如何为我们提供关于印加记录保存和社会实践的新见解。虽然印加以缺乏书面语言而闻名，但他们利用一种名为“奇普”的结绳系统来记录信息，包括人口普查数据、税收和历史叙事。关于“奇普”的谜团在于，它们如何在没有文字的情况下传递复杂的信息。

研究人员现在正在使用头发样本来分析该女性在被献祭之前的饮食和药物使用情况。通过检查头发中存在的化学同位素（这些同位素记录了随着时间推移的饮食摄入量），他们可以重建她的行动轨迹和社会地位。具体而言，饮食的变化（从农民食物过渡到玉米和肉类等精英食物）以及古柯等物质的存在表明她正在为某种仪式做准备。

这种类型的分析意义重大，因为它能够与“奇普”上记录的信息相关联。通过研究多个与特定“奇普”相关的个体遗骸，科学家们希望破译编码在绳结和颜色中的含义。例如，饮食变化和古柯的使用可能对应于“奇普”中记录的特定事件或仪式。因此，这种结合了考古科学、历史记录和“奇普”分析的跨学科方法，可能会彻底改变我们对印加文明及其复杂记录保存系统的理解，从而提供一种超越传统西班牙殖民叙事的新视角。

title: Show HN: Lue – Terminal eBook Reader with Text-to-Speech
summary:
Lue is a terminal-based eBook reader with text-to-speech (TTS) functionality, supporting multiple formats like EPUB, PDF, TXT, DOCX, HTML, RTF, and Markdown. It offers a clean terminal UI with mouse and keyboard controls, automatic progress saving, and cross-platform compatibility for macOS, Linux, and Windows with support for over 100 languages.

Lue features a modular TTS system, with Edge TTS (online) as the default and Kokoro TTS (local/offline) available. Installation instructions are provided for various operating systems, including steps for enabling the offline Kokoro TTS. The quick start guide involves installing FFmpeg (required for audio processing) and cloning/setting up the Lue repository.

Basic usage includes commands for starting the reader, specifying a TTS model and voice, enabling a PDF cleaning filter, and viewing available options. Keyboard and mouse controls are outlined for navigation.

The documentation also includes information for developers interested in extending Lue with new TTS models and contributing to the project. It provides data storage locations for reading progress and error logs on different operating systems. Lue is licensed under GPL-3.0, and contributions are welcomed.
chinese_title: Show HN: Lue – 带语音合成功能的终端电子书阅读器
chinese_summary:
Lue：一款终端电子书阅读器，具备文本转语音（TTS）功能，支持EPUB、PDF、TXT、DOCX、HTML、RTF和Markdown等多种格式。它提供简洁的终端用户界面，支持鼠标和键盘控制，自动保存阅读进度，并具有跨平台兼容性，适用于macOS、Linux和Windows，支持100多种语言。

Lue采用模块化TTS系统，默认使用Edge TTS（在线），并提供Kokoro TTS（本地/离线）。安装说明适用于各种操作系统，包括启用离线Kokoro TTS的步骤。快速入门指南包括安装FFmpeg（音频处理所需）以及克隆/设置Lue仓库。

基本用法包括启动阅读器、指定TTS模型和语音、启用PDF清理过滤器以及查看可用选项的命令。概述了键盘和鼠标的导航控制。

文档还包括面向希望使用新的TTS模型扩展Lue并为项目做出贡献的开发人员的信息。它提供了不同操作系统上阅读进度和错误日志的数据存储位置。Lue在GPL-3.0许可下发布，欢迎贡献。
